channel.title: Black Mesa: Lambda Bunker
channel.description:
Here is a new addition I have been working on. Even though the level structure and design is very easy to mimic and recreate; I was still busy with other things such as gasworks. I tried mimicking Black Mesa's style and Half-Life 1's style and combine it into one feeling, but making it feel like Black Mesa overall though. Here are some screenies:
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-e-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpa1/t31.0-8/10504795_699243310129755_8271819655077345908_o.jpg[/img]

[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-d-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpf1/t31.0-8/10494509_699242653463154_4252079420410528350_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-f-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xap1/t31.0-8/10453076_699242640129822_6437241100764832440_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://scontent-a-dfw.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpa1/t31.0-8/10507140_699242633463156_292236440034268598_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpa1/t31.0-8/10506902_699242620129824_657251622337181978_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://scontent-b-dfw.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpf1/t31.0-8/10443025_699242613463158_3092238991438292547_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-b-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xap1/t31.0-8/10479352_699242606796492_915024106624456510_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-d-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xap1/t31.0-8/10497449_699242580129828_5463821729556280845_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-f-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xfp1/t31.0-8/10348820_699242516796501_7817472417208787205_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-c-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpa1/t31.0-8/10498318_699242500129836_2619326849146949980_o.jpg[/img]

item.title: Black Mesa: Lambda Bunker
item.dc:creator: Iron_Woodside
item.description:
That’s About it for this map. This is one of the smaller Half-Life maps so I decided to pump this one out because it was the easiest one to do.
Thanks and Goodbye

Video:
https://youtu.be/9MsdtD6C_PU

Read full topic
